name: Space Bunny Suit 3000-XTREME
description:
In this little game you as a space bunny need to escape an evil fox. Luckily you have your Space Bunny Suit 3000XTreme at your side (or more like all around you). To make it easy for bunnies to use this suit it only has one button, the space button (space bar). So in this game you controll your character by using only the space bar. Pressing it in different patterns will lead to different actions.

Hope you can get through all four stages!

IMPORTANT: On some devices you might have to zoom out a bit. Or just use the full-screen mode!

IMPORTANT: In case you feel like you cannot jump. Press SPACE shorter. Like REALLY short. If there is a long bar above the player instead of a dot, then you are pressing to long.

We did (pretty much) all the code and art. Music is from opengameart.org made by these lovely guys:
xeon 6 - bart
at work - HorrorPen
Delusion - Alexandr Zhelanov

SoundeEffects were also not done by us. They are from Little Robot Sound Factory (www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com)
